org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.javafx

Class DefaultJavaFXWindowDisplayHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.griffon.runtime.javafx.DefaultJavaFXWindowDisplayHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WindowDisplayHandler<javafx.stage.Window>, JavaFXWindowDisplayHandler

    public class DefaultJavaFXWindowDisplayHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements JavaFXWindowDisplayHandler
    Default implementation of WindowDisplayHandler that simply makes the window visible on show() and disposes it on hide().
    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray
